name: Longing For Them
description:
Week two of game a week, this weeks theme was durational which is very similar to last weeks game as it involves time but this let us use larger amounts of time.

Longing for them is more of an interactive environment than it is a "game", but it is about a sentient AI managing a space ship heading to a new planet, and its gonna take a hell of a long time to get there.

The game was meant to be deeper and have more of a narrative but due to time i wasn't able to fully explore that.

  • Left click on cameras to move towards them.
  • Right click anywhere to move back to a previous camera.
  • click ESC to open menu
  • Shutdown makes time pass
  • Exit quits the game

Feedback is very much appreciated, tell me what you love, tell me what you hate, tell me about your day, anything is appreciated.
